sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function NavigationBarMobile() { const [topics, setTopics] = useState(false); const [sources, setSources] = useState(false); const [languages, setLanguages] = useState(false); return (
setTopics(topics ? false : true)} > Topics
{topics ? (
Health Science Sports Entertainment Business Technology
) : null}
setSources(sources ? false : true)} > Sources
{sources ? (
CNN Time Reuters BBC-NEWS ESPN
) : null}
setLanguages(languages ? false : true)} > Languages
English Spanish Russian German Arabic Italian
); }
